Name: 渡劫 x 魔女 ~ Team up with A Magician！
About the game: The orc magician who came down from the sky ended my lonely life. However, my peaceful daily life was also disturbed. Children's cartoon like love and justice adventure visual novel game, accompanied by vivid and lovely live2d dynamic vertical painting slowly show. Game style: This work is an all-age adventure GALGAME. The plot is easy, funny and inspirational. Script words: about 140000 words Number of CGs: 15 basic CGs Game CV: heroine voice The heroine from different dimensions is powerful, dark bellied and eager to learn. A baby faced young man is a semi detached social person.
